group.description: Optional group to which the content belongs.

runalias.description: Optional alias to run the content.

versions.description: Optional list of services and versions related to the snippet.

brief.description: Optional brief description of the content.

filename.description: Optional filename that that defines automatically used filename when content is exported.

created.description: Optional UTC timestamp for creation time in ISO 8601 format that is automatically assigned if left out.

data.description: Mandatory content data in list context with one line per element.

digest.description: Automatically assigned message digest that uniquely identifies the content.
